StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
An aspiring Data Scientist with highly motivated and leadership skills having PG Diploma in Data Science.
* Proficient in Machine Learning skills for multiple applications including NLP.
* Used python and spark to scrape, clean and analyse large Datasets
* Performed analytical tasks on vast amounts of structured and unstructured data to extract actionable business insights.
* Created machine learning models using python and sci-kit learn to predict probability of default with 98% accuracy.
* Designed and implemented Business Applications using Oracle Relational Database Management system(RDBMS).
* Proven passion for the data quality discipline.
* Participated in data processing and data mining of large and Complex Datasets

Projects
Project Title: Loan issued by XYZ-Corp(2007-2015)-Credit Risk Management
Client: Imarticus Learning
Nature of Employment: Full Time	Duration: Mar 2019 - Apr 2019
Onsite / Offsite: Offsite
Project Details: In this project you will have to put yourself in the shoes of a loan issuer and manage credit risk by using the
past data and deciding whom to give the loan to in the future. The text files contain complete loan data for all loans issued by
XYZ Corp. through 2007-2015. The data contains the indicator of default, payment information, credit history, etc.
You will have use the training data to build models/analytical solution and finally apply it to test data to measure the
performance and robustness of the models.


Affirmative Action	Work Authorization
Category: SC	Job Type: Permanent
Physically Challenged: No	Employment Status: Full time
